caseDetails: Patient has been experiencing lower back pain for 6 months, especially after sitting for extended periods. Previous MRI shows mild disc bulging at L4-L5.
notes: Patient reported chronic back pain for the past 3 months.

caseDetails: Review of antihypertensive medication regimen. Currently on Lisinopril 10mg daily. Recent blood pressure readings averaging 138/85.
notes: Follow-up on medication effectiveness and side effects.

caseDetails: Post-rotator cuff surgery (performed 8 weeks ago). Limited range of motion with some pain during specific movements. Currently in physical therapy twice weekly.
notes: Ongoing physical therapy for shoulder rehabilitation.

caseDetails: Recurrent tension headaches, typically occurring 3-4 times per week. Pain described as a band-like pressure around the head. No aura or nausea reported.
notes: Patient requested rescheduling due to scheduling conflict.

caseDetails: Review of recent blood work including comprehensive metabolic panel, lipid profile, and thyroid function tests. Patient has history of borderline cholesterol levels.
notes: Review of lab results and treatment plan adjustment.

caseDetails: Migraine episodes occurring 2-3 times monthly with increasing frequency. Associated symptoms include visual aura, nausea, and sensitivity to light. Family history of migraines.
notes: New patient intake for chronic migraines.

caseDetails: ACL reconstruction surgery 12 weeks ago. Progressing through rehabilitation protocol. Currently working on strength training and proprioception exercises.
notes: Completed third session of knee rehabilitation therapy.

caseDetails: Follow-up appointment after laparoscopic appendectomy performed 2 weeks ago. Recovery has been uneventful with minimal pain at incision sites.
notes: Post-surgery follow-up appointment.

caseDetails: Initial consultation for weight management program. BMI currently 32.5. Patient reports previous attempts at weight loss with limited success. No other significant health issues.
notes: Initial consultation for weight management program.

caseDetails: Routine blood pressure monitoring. History of hypertension controlled with lifestyle modifications. Recent readings show slight elevation from baseline.
notes: Medication review and blood pressure check.

caseDetails: Type 2 diabetes diagnosed 3 years ago. Currently managed with Metformin 1000mg twice daily. Recent A1C: 7.2. Reports occasional hypoglycemia after exercise.
notes: Follow-up appointment for diabetes management.

caseDetails: 27 weeks pregnant, G2P1. Normal pregnancy progression. BP: 110/70, fetal heart rate 145 bpm. Patient reports mild lower back discomfort.
notes: Routine prenatal check-up.

caseDetails: Moderate persistent asthma. Uses Flovent 110mcg BID and Albuterol as needed. Reports increased use of rescue inhaler during spring season.
notes: Seasonal asthma review and medication adjustment.

caseDetails: Generalized anxiety disorder diagnosed 1 year ago. Currently on Escitalopram 10mg daily. Reports improvement in symptoms but still experiencing occasional panic attacks.
notes: Follow-up for anxiety management and medication review.

caseDetails: Routine annual physical exam. No significant health concerns. Last physical was 14 months ago with normal findings. Family history of hypertension and diabetes.
notes: Annual physical examination completed.

caseDetails: Persistent eczema on both arms and neck. Previous treatments with OTC hydrocortisone with minimal improvement. No known allergies or recent changes in soaps/detergents.
notes: Consultation for treatment of persistent eczema.

caseDetails: Post-surgical follow-up after knee arthroscopy for meniscal tear 6 weeks ago. Currently using a cane for stability. Reports gradual improvement in pain and mobility.
notes: Post-operative follow-up appointment.

caseDetails: 4-year-old child for routine check-up. Up-to-date on vaccinations. Developmental milestones appropriate for age. Parent concerned about picky eating habits.
notes: Routine pediatric check-up and development assessment.

caseDetails: Recurrent sinusitis, 4 episodes in past year. Previous treatment with antibiotics provided temporary relief. Reports facial pain, congestion, and post-nasal drip.
notes: Consultation for chronic sinusitis symptoms.

caseDetails: Annual gynecological exam. Last Pap smear was 13 months ago (normal). History of ovarian cysts. Currently using combined oral contraceptive pills.
notes: Annual gynecological examination completed.

caseDetails: Atrial fibrillation diagnosed 2 years ago. On Metoprolol 25mg BID and Eliquis 5mg BID. Recent EKG showed controlled rate. Reports occasional palpitations with exertion.
notes: Follow-up for atrial fibrillation management.

caseDetails: Seeking nutrition guidance for recently diagnosed celiac disease. Experiencing difficulty with meal planning and finding suitable alternatives. Reports unintentional weight loss of 8 lbs.
notes: Initial nutrition counseling session for celiac disease management.

caseDetails: Persistent low back pain after workplace injury 3 months ago. Conservative management with NSAIDs and rest has been minimally effective. MRI shows mild disc bulging at L5-S1.
notes: Initial evaluation for physical therapy treatment.

caseDetails: Hypothyroidism diagnosed 5 years ago. Currently on Levothyroxine 75mcg daily. Recent TSH: 3.8. Reports persistent fatigue despite medication compliance.
notes: Follow-up for thyroid management and medication adjustment.

caseDetails: Suspected environmental allergies with seasonal exacerbations. Symptoms include rhinorrhea, itchy eyes, and occasional hives. OTC antihistamines provide partial relief.
notes: Allergy testing and consultation for management plan.

caseDetails: Rheumatoid arthritis diagnosed 3 years ago. Currently on Methotrexate 15mg weekly and Prednisone 5mg daily. Reports morning stiffness lasting 1-2 hours and increased joint pain in fingers.
notes: Quarterly follow-up for rheumatoid arthritis management.

caseDetails: Benign prostatic hyperplasia with moderate lower urinary tract symptoms. International Prostate Symptom Score: 16. Bladder scan shows post-void residual of 120ml.
notes: Consultation for evaluation and management of BPH.

caseDetails: New onset depressive symptoms following recent job loss. Reports low mood, anhedonia, insomnia, and decreased appetite for past 6 weeks. No previous psychiatric history.
notes: Initial mental health assessment and treatment planning.

caseDetails: Recent onset of intermittent right-sided facial numbness and tingling. Episodes last 10-15 minutes and occur 2-3 times weekly. No visual changes, headache, or speech difficulties reported.
notes: Neurological consultation for facial paresthesia.

caseDetails: Chronic epigastric pain and acid reflux for past 3 months. Symptoms worsen after meals and when lying down. Previous trial of OTC antacids with minimal improvement.
notes: Gastrointestinal evaluation for chronic epigastric pain and reflux.
